p.s: Emended description of the suborder Micrococcineae Stackebrandt et al. 1997
The pattern of 16S rRNA signatures consists of nucleotides at positions 127 : 234 (A–U), 598 : 640 (U–G), 657 : 749 (U–A), 953 : 1228 (G–C), 986 : 1219 (A–U), 987 : 1218 (A–U) and 1362 (A).

The suborder contains the families Micrococcaceae, Dermatophilaceae, Beutenbergiaceae, Bogoriellaceae, Brevibacteriaceae, Cellulomonadaceae, Dermabacteraceae, Dermacoccaceae, Intrasporangiaceae, Jonesiaceae, Microbacteriaceae, Promicromonosporaceae, Rarobacteraceae, Sanguibacteraceae and Yaniellaceae.
The nomenclatural type is the genus Micrococcus Cohn 1872.

Residues in lower-case letters are present in some but not all strains.
